• Everyone has the right to the highest attainable standard of physical and mental health.

 	• States have a responsibility to ensure access to medical care and necessary social services, regardless of economic or social status.

 	• States must take measures to prevent, treat, and control epidemic, endemic, occupational, and other diseases.

 	• Everyone has the right to information and education on health-related issues.

 	• States must ensure the provision of safe and healthy working conditions, and protect workers in hazardous occupations.
